description: This file defines a Button component using the LightningJS framework, including its template, state, and input handlers.

methods.name: template
methods.description: Template defining the component's UI layout, with conditional text based on component state.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initial state of the component, including 'isFavorited' boolean and text labels.

methods.name: input
methods.description: Input handler object, defining behavior when the 'enter' key is pressed, toggling 'isFavorited'.
